name: Web Bundle
summary: A WBN file is a website saved as a single file. It contains all of the website's content, including webpages , images, fonts, scripts, and other assets. The WBN format was created by the Web Incubator Community Group (WICG).

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: WBN file open in Web Archive Browsing Advanced Client
images.alt: WBN file open in Web Archive Browsing Advanced Client
